metadata.Title: CVE-2020-20740 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PDFResurrect before 0.20 lack of header validation checks causes heap-buffer-overflow in pdf_get_version().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-20740` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdfresurrect - 0.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.22-1').
